SystemVersion.UpdateDescription: * Support for new Languages (English / Portuguese){0}{0}* Added option to choose when close the system.{0}{0}* New feature 'Tibia.cfg Management'.{0}{0}* Appearance and usability improvement.{0}{0}* Fixed some english spell errors.{0}{0}* Auto Update feature Implemented.{0}{0}* In next udpates your settings will be saved.{0}
